entry.title: Giovanni Roast Beef Sandwich
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • Ciabatta roll
  • Sliced roast beef
  • Swiss cheese
  • Sliced red onion
  • Roasted red peppers
  • Red pepper pesto

Steps

  1. Toast outsides of bun under broiler, assemble sandwich open-faced, and toast under the broiler again. Alternatively, assemble sandwich then toast in a panini press.

entry.content:
Ingredients

entry.title: Santa Fe Turkey Sandwich
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • Rosemary focaccia roll
  • Sliced turkey breast
  • Monterey cheese
  • Bacon
  • Canned diced green chili peppers peppers
  • Red pepper pesto

Steps

  1. Toast outsides of bun under broiler, assemble sandwich open-faced, and toast under the broiler again. Alternatively, assemble sandwich then toast in a panini press.

entry.title: Munchies Coleslaw
entry.summary:
Ingredients

  • 1/2 head cabbage
  • 1/2 handful chopped fresh parsley

For vinaigrette:

  • 4 pinches celery seed
  • 3 Tbs white vinegar
  • 1 Tbs sugar
  • 1/2 cup canola oil

Steps

  1. Remove core of cabbage and cut once for 2 1/4 cabbage chunks. Lay chunks with outside of the cabbage …
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • 1/2 head cabbage
  • 1/2 handful chopped fresh parsley

For vinaigrette:

  • 4 pinches celery seed
  • 3 Tbs white vinegar
  • 1 Tbs sugar
  • 1/2 cup canola oil

Steps

  1. Remove core of cabbage and cut once for 2 1/4 cabbage chunks. Lay chunks with outside of the cabbage up and slice very thinly.

  2. Mix vinaigrette ingredients together in a bowl.

  3. Add cabbage and parsley to a large bowl. Slowly mix in vinaigrette in small batches until tasty, reserving leftover vinaigrette.

Source

Matty Makes Oven Baked BBQ Ribs It's Suppertime!

entry.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
entry.summary:
Ingredients

  • 8 oz baby bella mushrooms
  • 3/4 stick of butter
  • 1 cup bread crumbs
  • 1 tsp minced garlic
  • Sprinkle of parmesan

Steps

  1. Hollow out mushrooms and dice the mushroom stems.
  2. Melt butter in pan, then sautee mushroom stems.
  3. Sautee garlic when stems are done.
  4. Mix bread crumbs and parmesan …
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • 8 oz baby bella mushrooms
  • 3/4 stick of butter
  • 1 cup bread crumbs
  • 1 tsp minced garlic
  • Sprinkle of parmesan

Steps

  1. Hollow out mushrooms and dice the mushroom stems.
  2. Melt butter in pan, then sautee mushroom stems.
  3. Sautee garlic when stems are done.
  4. Mix bread crumbs and parmesan into pan and fill mushrooms with the mixture.
  5. Bake mushrooms for 15 minutes at 350 degrees.
